DynamicsCompressorNodeRelease.summary: The release property of the interface Is a k-rate representing the amount of time, in seconds, required to increase the gain by 10 dB. It defines how quick the signal is adapted when its volume is reduced.

remarks.para: The release property's default value is 0.25 and it can be set between 0 and 1.

DynamicsCompressorNodeRelease.value:
An .
NOTENote: Though the returned is read-only, the value it represents is not.
